title: "Meta-learning helps to estimate oceanic barrier layer structure"
excerpt: "The oceanic barrier layer is situated between the base of the ocean's density mixed layer and the top of the isothermal layer, with its thickness fluctuations directly influencing the ocean's vertical mixing process."
